'''Hiril''' was the younger daughter of [[Halmir]], third [[Halad]] or warden of the [[Haladin]]. She was the sister of [[Haldir (Chieftain of the Haladin)|Haldir]], [[Hareth]], and [[Hundar]]. She was married to [[Enthor]] and she bore him a daughter [[Meleth]].<ref>{{WJ|Hurin}}, p. 270</ref>

== Etymology ==
''Hiril'' means "lady" in [[Sindarin]] (''[[Hîr]]'' + ''[[-il]]'').
